thread.title: Hornets rout Clippers 113-71 in 2nd preseason game in China
thread.title_full: Hornets rout Clippers 113-71 in 2nd preseason game in China

title: Hornets rout Clippers 113-71 in 2nd preseason game in China
text:
Published By: Charlotte Observer: Hornets - Today 
Al Jefferson scored 17 points and Nicolas Batum added 14 with 10 rebounds to lead the Charlotte Hornets over the Los Angeles Clippers 113-71...
